ReferenceBlocks.text: ACTS

block.text: ACTS

ReferenceBlocks.text: ACTS 1
Dear Theophilus, in my first book, I told all that Jesus did and taught from the beginning

block.text: Tiofilus, long dispela buk bipo mi raitim, mi raitim tok long olgeta samting Jisas i bin mekim na long olgeta skul em i bin givim long ol manmeri, long pastaim tru

ReferenceBlocks.text: until he ascended to heaven. He chose men as apostles, and before ascending into heaven, he gave them His commandments by the power of the Holy Spirit.

block.text: na i kam inap long dispela de God i kisim em i go antap. Em i bin kamap long ol aposel em i bin makim, na long strong bilong Holi Spirit em i tokim ol long ol kain kain wok ol i mas mekim. Na bihain God i kisim em i go antap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: To these he also showed himself alive after he suffered, by many infallible proofs, appearing to them over a period of forty days, and speaking about God’s Kingdom.

block.text: Pastaim em i bin karim pen na i dai, na bihain em i kisim laip gen na i kamap long ol aposel. Na em i mekim planti samting, bilong ol i ken save tru, em i stap laip. Inap long 40 de ol i lukim em, na em i tokim ol long kingdom bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Being assembled together with them, he commanded them,

block.text: Taim em i stap yet wantaim ol, em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don’t depart from Jerusalem, but wait for the promise of the Father, which you heard from me.

block.text: "Yupela i no ken lusim Jerusalem. Yupela i mas wetim dispela samting Papa i tok em i laik givim long yupela, na bipo mi tokim yupela long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For John indeed baptized in water, but you will be baptized in the Holy Spirit not many days from now.”

block.text: Jon i bin baptaisim ol manmeri long wara. Tasol i no planti de nau na bai yupela i kisim baptais long Holi Spirit."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore when they had come together, they asked him,

block.text: Long dispela taim ol aposel i bung wantaim, na ol i askim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, are you now restoring the kingdom to Israel?”

block.text: "Bikpela, ating nau long dispela taim bai yu mekim kantri Israel i kamap strong gen na i gat king i bosim em, o nogat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Na em i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It isn’t for you to know times or seasons which the Father has set within his own authority.

block.text: "Em i no samting bilong yupela bai yupela i save long ol taim na ol de Papa i makim. Nogat. Em yet i bosim dispela ol samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But you will receive power when the Holy Spirit has come upon you. You will be witnesses to me in Jerusalem, in all Judea and Samaria, and to the uttermost parts of the earth.”

block.text: Tasol bihain Holi Spirit bai i kam i stap long yupela, na yupela bai i kisim strong. Na yupela bai i autim tok bilong mi long Jerusalem, na long olgeta hap bilong Judia, na long distrik Samaria, na i go inap long olgeta hap bilong graun."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he had said these things, as they were looking, he was taken up, and a cloud received him out of their sight.

block.text: Jisas i mekim dispela tok pinis, na taim ol i lukluk i stap, em i go antap. Na wanpela klaut i haitim em, na ol i no lukim em moa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: While they were looking steadfastly into the sky as he went, behold, two men stood by them in white clothing,
who also said,

block.text: Em i go pinis, na ol i lukluk yet long skai, na wantu tupela man i sanap wantaim ol. Tupela i gat waitpela klos.
Tupela i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You men of Galilee, why do you stand looking into the sky? This Jesus, who was received up from you into the sky will come back in the same way as you saw him going into the sky.”

block.text: "Yupela man bilong Galili, bilong wanem yupela i sanap nating na lukluk i go long skai? Dispela Jisas, nau God i kisim em na em i lusim yupela na i go antap long heven, em bai i kam bek gen long wankain pasin olsem nau yupela i lukim em i go long heven."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then they returned to Jerusalem from the mountain called Olivet, which is near Jerusalem, a Sabbath day’s journey away.

block.text: Orait ol aposel i lusim dispela maunten ol i kolim Oliv, na ol i go bek long Jerusalem. Dispela maunten Oliv em i stap klostu tasol long Jerusalem, inap olsem wan kilomita.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had come in, they went up into the upper room, where they were staying. Those present were: Peter, John, James, Andrew, Philip, Thomas, Bartholomew, Matthew, James the son of Alphaeus, Simon the Zealot, and Judas the son of James.

block.text: Ol i go insait long taun, na ol i go long dispela rum antap ol i save stap long en. Nembilong ol i olsem, Pita na Jon na Jems na Andru na Filip na Tomas na Bartolomyu na Matyu, na Jems, em pikinini bilong Alfius, na Saimon, em wanpela man bilong lain Selot, na Judas, em pikinini bilong Jems.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All these with one accord continued steadfastly in prayer and supplication, along with the women, and Mary the mother of Jesus, and with his brothers.

block.text: Olgeta dispela man i stap wanbel na ol i save bung na beten. Naol meri, na Maria, em mama bilong Jisas, na ol brata bilong Jisas, oltu i save kam na beten wantaim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In these days, Peter stood up in the midst of the disciples (and the number of names was about one hundred twenty), and said,

block.text: Long dispela taim namba bilong ol manmeri i bilip long Jisas em inap olsem 120 olgeta. Na Pita i sanap namel long ol na em i autim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Brothers, it was necessary that this Scripture should be fulfilled, which the Holy Spirit spoke before by the mouth of David concerning Judas, who was guide to those who took Jesus.

block.text: "Ol brata, bipo Holi Spirit i mekim Devit i autim wanpela tok, na dispela tok i stap long buk bilong God. Em i tok long Judas, em dispela man i bin soim rot long ol man i holimpas Jisas. Na nau dispela i kamap pinis olsem Devit i bin tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he was numbered with us, and received his portion in this ministry.

block.text: Bipo Judas i stap long lain bilong mipela, na em i kisim wankain wok olsem mipela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now this man obtained a field with the reward for his wickedness, and falling headlong, his body burst open, and all his intestines gushed out.

block.text: Dispela man Judas i kisim mani olsem pe bilong dispela pasin nogut em i bin mekim, na em i baim wanpela hap graun. Na bihain em i pundaun long dispela graun na bel bilong en i bruk, na olgeta bel bilong en i kapsait long graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It became known to everyone who lived in Jerusalem that in their language that field was called ‘Akeldama,’ that is, ‘The field of blood.’

block.text: Bihain olgeta man i stap long Jerusalem ol i save long dispela. Na long tok ples bilong ol, ol i kolim dispela graun Akeldama. Nem "Akeldama" em i wankain olsem dispela tok, "Graun I Gat Blut."

ReferenceBlocks.text: For it is written in the book of Psalms, ‘Let his habitation be made desolate. Let no one dwell therein;’ and, ‘Let another take his office.’”

block.text: Orait Pita i tok moa olsem, "Dispela tok ol i raitim long Buk Song em i olsem, 'Ples em i bin i stap long en, em i ken i stap nating, na yu no ken larim wanpela man i stap long en.' Na long narapela hap bilong dispela buk i gat tok olsem, 'Narapela man i ken kisim wok bilong en.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Therefore, the man who will replace Judas should be one of the men who accompanied us all the time that the Lord Jesus was with us.

block.text: "Olsem na nau yumi mas makim wanpela man namel long ol man i bin wokabaut wantaim yumi long olgeta taim Bikpela Jisas i bin i go i kam wantaim yumi,

ReferenceBlocks.text: He must have been with Jesus from the day he was baptised by John, to the day that he was received up to Heaven from us. He must become a witness with us of his resurrection.”

block.text: stat long taim Jon i wok long baptaisim ol manmeri, na Jisas i kirapim wok bilong en na i kam inap long dispela de God i kisim Jisas na em i lusim yumi na i go antap. Yumi mas makim wanpela man i bin lukim dispela olgeta samting, na em i mas kisim wok wantaim mipela bilong autim tok long Jisas i kirap bek."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They put forward two, Joseph called Barsabbas, who was surnamed Justus, and Matthias.
They prayed, and said,

block.text: Pita i tok olsem, orait ol i makim tupela man. Narapela em Josep, ol i kolim Barsabas, na em i gat narapela nem tu, em Jastus. Na narapela man em Matias.
Na ol i beten olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You, Lord, who know the hearts of all men, show which one of these two you have chosen
to take part in this ministry and apostleship from which Judas fell away, that he might go to his own place.”

block.text: "Bikpela, yu save long bel bilong olgeta man. Yu ken soim mipela, yu bin makim wanem man long dispela tupela
long kamap aposel na kisim ples bilong Judas. Judas I lusim dispela wok pinis na em i go long dispela ples em i mas i stap long en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They drew lots for them, and the lot fell on Matthias, and he was numbered with the eleven apostles.

block.text: Orait na ol i tromoi ston bilong makim husat i mas kisim dispela wok, na ston bilong Matias i kamap. Olsem na ol i putim em wantaim ol 11 -pela aposel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: ACTS 2
Now when the day of Pentecost had come, they were all with one accord in one place.

block.text: Bikpela De Bilong Pentikos i kam pinis, na ol manmeri i bilip long Jisas ol i bung wantaim long wanpela haus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Suddenly there came from the sky a sound like the rushing of a mighty wind, and it filled all the house where they were sitting.

block.text: Na wantu wanpela nois i kam long heven, em i olsem krai bilong strongpela win, na i pulapim tru dispela haus ol i sindaun i stap long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Tongues like fire appeared and were distributed to them, and one sat on each of them.

block.text: Na ol i lukim samting olsem paia i kamap, na i luk olsem planti tang bilong man. Na ol dispela tang i go nabaut na i stap long olgeta bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were all filled with the Holy Spirit, and began to speak with other languages, as the Spirit gave them the ability to speak.

block.text: Na Holi Spirit i pulap long olgeta dispela manmeri, na ol i stat long mekim tok long ol kain kain tok ples. Holi Spirit i mekim na ol inap mekim ol dispela toktok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now there were dwelling in Jerusalem Jews, devout men, from every nation under the sky.

block.text: I gat sampela Juda i kam i stap long Jerusalem, ol i man bilong lotu long God, na ol i kam long olgeta kantri bilong graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When this sound was heard, the multitude came together, and were bewildered, because everyone heard them speaking in his own language.

block.text: Taim dispela nois i kamap, planti manmeri i harim na ol i kam bung. Na ol i putim yau long ol toktok ol manmeri i bilip long Jisas i mekim, na ol i kirap nogut, long wanem, ol wan wan man na meri i harim ol i toktok long tok ples bilong em stret.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were all amazed and marveled, saying to one another,

block.text: Ol dispela Juda i kirap nogut na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, aren’t all these who speak Galileans?

block.text: "Ating dispela olgeta manmeri ol i lain bilong Galili tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: How do we hear, everyone in our own native language?

block.text: Olsem wanem na yumi olgeta wan wan yumi harim ol i toktok long tok ples bilong yumi stret.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Parthians, Medes, Elamites, and people from Mesopotamia, Judea, Cappadocia, Pontus, Asia,

block.text: Yumi ol lain bilong kantri Partia na Midia na Elam, na yumi ol man i stap long distrik Mesopotemia na long distrik Judia na long provins Kapadosia na long provins Pontus na Esia

ReferenceBlocks.text: Phrygia, Pamphylia, Egypt, the parts of Libya around Cyrene, visitors from Rome, both Jews and proselytes,

block.text: na long distrik Frigia na Pamfilia na long kantri Isip na long ol hap bilong distrik Libia i stap klostu long taun Sairini, na yumi ol man bilong kantri Rom i kam i stap hia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Cretans and Arabians: we hear them speaking in our languages the mighty works of God!”

block.text: Yumi Juda wantaim ol arapela man i bihainim lotu bilong yumi, na yumi ol lain bilong ailan Krit na distrik Arebia, yumi olgeta i harim ol i autim tok bilong ol strongpela wok bilong God long ol tok ples bilong yumi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were all amazed, and were perplexed, saying one to another,

block.text: Na olgeta i kirap nogut, na ol i tingting planti. Na ol I toktok namel long ol yet olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What does this mean?”

block.text: "Dispela samting nau i kamap, em wanem kain samting tru?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Others, mocking, said,

block.text: Tasol sampela i tok bilas olsem,

block.characterId: Jews, God-fearing from every nation, some

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: Jews, God-fearing from every nation, some
ReferenceBlocks.text: “They are filled with new wine.”

block.text: "Ol I dringim planti nupela wain na ol i spak."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Peter, standing up with the eleven, lifted up his voice, and spoke out to them,

block.text: Orait Pita i sanap wantaim ol 11 -pela arapela aposel na em isingaut strong na i tokaut long ol manmeri olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You men of Judea, and all you who dwell at Jerusalem, let this be known to you, and listen to my words.

block.text: "Yupela Juda na yupela olgeta man i kam i stap long Jerusalem, yupela putim yau long tok bilong mi, na yupela i ken save long as bilong dispela samting yupela i lukim nau.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For these aren’t drunken, as you suppose, seeing it is only the third hour of the day.

block.text: Yupela i ting dispela ol man i spak, a? Nogat tru. Nau em i 9 klok tasol long moning.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But this is what has been spoken through the prophet Joel:

block.text: Dispela samting nau i kamap, em samting bipo profet Joel i bin tok long en. Em i bin tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: ‘It will be in the last days, says God, that I will pour out my Spirit on all flesh. Your sons and your daughters will prophesy. Your young men will see visions. Your old men will dream dreams.

block.text: 'God i tok, "Klostu long las de bai mi kapsaitim Spirit bilong mi long olgeta manmeri. Na ol pikinini man na pikinini meri bilong yupela bai i autim tok bilong mi olsem ol profet. Na ol yangpela man bilong yupela bai i lukim ol samting olsem driman, na ol lapun man bai i driman.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yes, and on my servants and on my handmaidens in those days, I will pour out my Spirit, and they will prophesy.

block.text: Na long dispela taim bai mi kapsaitim Spirit bilong mi long ol wokboi na ol wokmeri bilong mi, na bai ol i autim tok bilong mi olsem ol profet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I will show wonders in the sky above, and signs on the earth beneath; blood, and fire, and billows of smoke.

block.text: Bai mi mekim ol narakain samting i kamap antap long skai, na bai mi wokim ol mirakel long graun daunbilo olsem ol mak bilong dispela De. Blut na paia na bikpela smok bai i kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The sun will be turned into darkness, and the moon into blood, before the great and glorious day of the Lord comes.

block.text: Na bai san i kamap tudak, na mun bai i kamap retpela olsem blut. Na bihain bai De bilong Bikpela i kamap, em de Bikpela bai i soim bikpela strong na lait bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It will be, that whoever will call on the name of the Lord will be saved.’”

block.text: Na long dispela taim olgeta manmeri i singaut long Bikpela long helpim ol, em bai i kisim bek ol na bai ol i stap gut.'" Em ol tok profet Joel i bin autim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Men of Israel, hear these words! Jesus of Nazareth was a man approved by God to you by mighty works and wonders and signs which God did by him in the midst of you, even as you yourselves know.

block.text: "Yupela man bilong Israel, putim yau long tok bilong mi. Mi laik tokim yupela long Jisas bilong Nasaret. Yupela yet i save long ol strongpela wok na ol kain kain mirakel God i bin wokim namel long yupela long han bilong dispela man. God i bin mekim olsem bai yupela i ken save, em yet i bin salim dispela man i kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He was handed over to you by the determined counsel and foreknowledge of God, and you, with the help of wicked men, put him to death by nailing him to a cross.

block.text: Na God i bin putim dispela man long han bilong yupela, olsem bipo yet em i bin tingim na i pasim tok pinis long mekim. Na long han bilong ol man nogut yupela i nilim em long diwai kros na kilim em i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: whom God raised up, having freed him from the agony of death, because it was not possible that he should be held by it.

block.text: Tasol God i kirapim bek dispela man na i no larim em i stap long ol pen nogut bilong dai, long wanem, dai i no inap holimpas dispela man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For David says concerning him, ‘I saw the Lord always before my face, For he is on my right hand, that I should not be moved.

block.text: Na bipo Devit tu i bin tok olsem long em, Mi lukim Bikpela i stap klostu tru long mi oltaim. Em i stap klostu na i givim strong long mi, olsem na i no gat wanpela samting i ken mekim mi i pret na guria.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore my heart was glad, and my tongue rejoiced. Moreover my flesh also will dwell in hope.

block.text: Olsem na bel bilong mi i gutpela tru, na mi mekim tok bilong amamas. Mi wetim ol gutpela samting God i laik mekim long mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You will not leave my soul in Hades, neither will you allow your Holy One to see decay.

block.text: Bai yu no larim mi i stap long ples bilong ol man i dai pinis. Na bai yu no larim man yu bin makim bilong yu yet i sting long matmat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You made known to me the ways of life. You will make me full of gladness with your presence.’”

block.text: Yu soim mi pinis rot bilong kisim laip. Bai yu larim mi i stap wantaim yu, na bai yu mekim mi i amamas moa yet.' Em ol tok Devit i bin autim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Brothers, I may tell you freely of the patriarch David, that he both died and was buried, and his tomb is with us to this day.

block.text: "Ol brata, mi laik tokaut stret long yupela long tumbuna bilong yumi, Devit. Em i dai pinis, na ol i planim em. Na matmat bilong en i stap namel long yumi inap long nau.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore, being a prophet, and knowing that God had sworn with an oath to him that of the fruit of his body, according to the flesh, he would raise up the Christ to sit on his throne,

block.text: Tasol Devit em i profet, na em i save, God i bin tok tru antap olsem, 'Bihain bai mi mekim wanpela bilong ol lain pikinini bilong yu i kamap king olsem yu.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: he foreseeing this spoke about the resurrection of the Christ, that neither was his soul left in Hades, nor did his flesh see decay.

block.text: Olsem na taim Devit i autim ol dispela tok long God bai i no larim em i stap long ples bilong ol man i dai pinis, na God bai i no larim em i sting long matmat, em i no tok long em yet. Nogat. Em i save pinis long samting God i laik mekim, na em i tok long dispela man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en, em bai i kirap bek long matmat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This Jesus God raised up, to which we all are witnesses.

block.text: Orait dispela man Jisas, God i kirapim em pinis long matmat. Mipela olgeta i lukim em bihain long em i kirap bek, na mipela i save tokaut long ol samting mipela i lukim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Being therefore exalted by the right hand of God, and having received from the Father the promise of the Holy Spirit, he has poured out this, which you now see and hear.

block.text: Na Jisas i go antap pinis na i stap long han sut bilong God. Em i kisim Holi Spirit pinis long han bilong Papa, olsem bipo Papa i bin tok long givim em. Na nau em i kapsaitim pinis, olsem yupela i lukim na i harim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For David didn’t ascend into the heavens, but he says himself, ‘The Lord said to my Lord, “Sit by my right hand,
until I make your enemies a footstool for your feet.”’”

block.text: Devit i no bin i go long heven olsem Jisas i bin go antap. Tasol Devit i bin tok olsem, 'Bikpela i tokim Bikpela bilong mi olsem, "Yu sindaun long han sut bilong mi
inap mi putim ol birua bilong yu i stap aninit long yu.'"

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Let all the house of Israel therefore know certainly that God has made him both Lord and Christ, this Jesus whom you crucified.”

block.text: "Olsem na yupela olgeta lain Israel, yupela i mas save gut olsem, dispela Jisas yupela i nilim em long diwai kros, God i makim em i stap Bikpela, na man bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now when they heard this, they were cut to the heart, and said to Peter and the rest of the apostles,

block.text: Ol manmeri i harim tok bilong Pita, na dispela tok i sutim tru bel bilong ol. Na ol i askim Pita wantaim ol arapela aposel olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Brothers, what shall we do?”

block.text: "Ol brata, bai mipela i mekim wanem nau?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Peter said to them,

block.text: Na Pita i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Repent, and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins, and you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

block.text: "Yupela olgeta wan wan i mas tanim bel na kisim baptais long nem bilong Jisas Krais, na God bai i lusim ol sin bilong yupela. Yupela i mekim olsem, na bai God i givim Holi Spirit long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.”

block.text: Bipo God i promis long givim Holi Spirit long yupela, na long ol pikinini bilong yupela, na long olgeta manmeri i stap longwe. God, Bikpela bilong yumi, em i bin promis long givim Holi Spirit long olgeta manmeri em i singautim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: With many other words he testified, and exhorted them, saying,

block.text: Na Pita i autim planti arapela tok tu long ol, na em i tok strong long ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Save yourselves from this crooked generation!”

block.text: "Lukaut. Yupela i mas was gut, nogut yupela i bagarap wantaim ol dispela lain man bilong mekim ol kain kain pasin nogut."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then those who gladly received his word were baptized. There were added that day about three thousand souls.

block.text: Tok bilong Pita i sutim bel bilong planti manmeri, na ol i kisim baptais. Long dispela de samting olsem 3,000 manmeri i kam insait long lain bilong ol manmeri i bilip long Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They continued steadfastly in the apostles’ teaching and fellowship, in the breaking of bread, and prayer.

block.text: Ol manmeri i strong long harim tok bilong ol aposel, na long helpim ol brata, na long kam bung na kaikai wantaim, na long beten.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Fear came on every soul, and many wonders and signs were done through the apostles.

block.text: Na God i wokim planti mirakel long han bilong ol aposel, na olgeta manmeri i lukim, ol i kirap nogut na i pret.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All who believed were together, and had all things in common.

block.text: Olgeta man i bilip long Jisas, ol i stap wanbel tru. Na ol i lukim olgeta samting bilong ol olsem samting bilong olgeta manmeri i bilip long Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They sold their possessions and goods, and distributed them to all, according as anyone had need.

block.text: Ol i save larim ol man i baim ol hap graun na ol samting bilong ol, na ol i kisim mani long dispela, na ol i tilim dispela mani long olgeta man i sot long kaikai samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Day by day, continuing steadfastly with one accord in the temple, and breaking bread at home, they took their food with gladness and singleness of heart.

block.text: Long olgeta de ol i save bung wantaim long tempel. Na ol i save kaikai wantaim long narapela narapela haus bilong ol. Bel bilong ol i gutpela, na ol i save amamas na kaikai wantaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They praised God, and had favor with all the people. The Lord added to the assembly day by day those who were being saved.

block.text: Oltaim ol i save litimapim nem bilong God, na olgeta manmeri i belgut long ol. Long olgeta de Bikpela i wok long kisim bek sampela manmeri, na long dispela pasin em i mekim namba bilong ol manmeri i bilip long Jisas i kamap planti moa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: ACTS 3
Peter and John were going up into the temple at the hour of prayer, the ninth hour.

block.text: Wanpela taim Pita wantaim Jon i go long tempel long 3 klok long apinun, long taim bilong mekim prea.

ReferenceBlocks.text: A certain man who was lame from his mother’s womb was being carried, whom they laid daily at the door of the temple which is called Beautiful, to ask gifts for the needy of those who entered into the temple.

block.text: Na tupela i lukim sampela man i bringim wanpela man i gat lek nogut i kam. Olgeta de ol i save karim em i kam na putim em klostu long dispela dua bilong tempel ol i kolim Naispela Dua. Na em i save singaut long mani samting long ol manmeri i go insait long tempel. Ol lek bilong dispela man i kamap nogut pinis long taim em i stap long bel bilong mama.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple, he asked to receive gifts for the needy.
Peter, fastening his eyes on him, with John, said,

block.text: Dispela man i lukim Pita wantaim Jon i laik i go insait long tempel, na em i askim tupela long givim samting long em.
Pita na Jon i lukluk strong long em, na Pita i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Look at us.”

block.text: "Yu lukluk long mitupela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He listened to them, expecting to receive something from them.
But Peter said,

block.text: Na dispela man i lukluk strong long tupela, long wanem, em i ting bai em i kisim samting long tupela.
Tasol Pita i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Silver and gold have I none, but what I have, that I give you. In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth, get up and walk!”

block.text: "Mi no gat mani. Tasol samting mi gat, em mi laik givim yu. Long nem bilong Jisas Krais bilong Nasaret mi tokim yu, yu kirap na wokabaut."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He took him by the right hand, and raised him up. Immediately his feet and his ankle bones received strength.

block.text: Na Pita i holim han sut bilong em na i helpim em long sanap. Orait wantu lek wantaim skru bilong en i kamap strong.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Leaping up, he stood, and began to walk. He entered with them into the temple, walking, leaping, and praising God.

block.text: Na em i kalap na i sanap na i wokabaut. Na em i go insait long tempel wantaim tupela, na i wokabaut na i kalap kalap na i litimapim nem bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All the people saw him walking and praising God.

block.text: Olgeta manmeri i lukim em i wokabaut na litimapim nem bilong God,

ReferenceBlocks.text: They recognized him. They knew that he was the crippled man who used to sit begging at the temple gate. They were filled with wonder, and they said:

block.text: na ol i save, em dispela man tasol oltaim em i save sindaun long dua bilong tempel ol i kolim Naispela Dua, na i save singaut long mani samting. Ol i lukim em i kamap orait pinis, na ol i kirap nogut, na tingting bilong ol i pas.

block.characterId: people in temple courts, all the

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: people in temple courts, all the
ReferenceBlocks.text: “What has happened to him is truly amazing!”
As the lame man who was healed held on to Peter and John, all the people ran together to them in the porch that is called Solomon’s, greatly wondering.

block.text: Ol manmeri i harim tok long dispela samting i kamap, na ol i kirap nogut tru na ol i ran i kam bilong lukim dispela man. Na ol i lukim em i holimpas Pita wantaim Jon na i sanap i stap long dispela veranda bilong tempel ol i kolim Veranda bilong Solomon.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When Peter saw it, he responded to the people,

block.text: Pita i lukim dispela, na em i tokim ol manmeri olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You men of Israel, why do you marvel at this man? Why do you fasten your eyes on us, as though by our own power or godliness we had made him walk?

block.text: "Yupela man bilong Israel, bilong wanem yupela i kirap nogut long dispela samting i bin kamap? Bilong wanem yupela i lukluk strong long mitupela? Ating yupela i ting, mitupela yet i gat bikpela strong o mitupela i stap gut tru long ai bilong God na mitupela i mekim dispela man i wokabaut, a? Nogat tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The God of Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, the God of our fathers, has glorified his Servant Jesus, whom you delivered up, and denied in the presence of Pilate, when he had determined to release him.

block.text: God bilong Abraham na bilong Aisak na bilong Jekop, em God bilong ol tumbuna bilong yumi, em i bin givim biknem tru bilong wokman bilong en Jisas. Em dispela man tasol yupela i bin putim long han bilong ol birua. Na taim Pailat i laik lusim em i go, yupela i bin givim baksait long Jisas na tok olsem Pailat i no ken larim em i go fri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But you denied the Holy and Righteous One, and asked for a murderer to be granted to you.

block.text: Dispela man i save aninit tru long God. Em i holi na i save mekim stretpela pasin olgeta, tasol yupela i bin givim baksait long em na yupela i bin singaut long Pailat i mas lusim narapela man i go long yupela, em man bilong kilim man i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You killed the Prince of life, whom God raised from the dead, to which we are witnesses.

block.text: Namba wan man bilong bringim yumi long rot bilong laip, em yupela i bin kilim i dai. Tasol God i kirapim em long matmat, na mitupela yet i lukim dispela na mitupela i tokaut long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By faith in his name, his name has made this man strong, whom you see and know. Yes, the faith which is through him has given him this perfect soundness in the presence of you all.”

block.text: Mitupela i bilip long Jisas, na long nem bilong Jisas tasol dispela man yupela i save long en, em i kamap strong. Jisas yet i kirapim bilip bilong mitupela, na dispela bilip tasol i bin mekim dispela man i kamap orait olgeta, olsem nau yupela i lukim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Now, brothers, I know that you did this in ignorance, as did also your rulers.

block.text: "Tru, ol brata, mi save, yupela wantaim ol hetman bilong yupela, yupela i no save gut na yupela i bin mekim dispela pasin long Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the things which God announced by the mouth of all his prophets, that Christ should suffer, he thus fulfilled.”

block.text: Tasol bipo God i bin autim tok long maus bilong olgeta profet, long dispela man em bai i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en, em i mas karim pen. Na nau long dispela pasin yupela i bin mekim, God i inapim pinis dispela tok bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Repent therefore, and turn again, that your sins may be blotted out, so that there may come times of refreshing from the presence of the Lord,
and that he may send Christ Jesus, who was ordained for you before.

block.text: "Olsem na yupela i mas senisim tingting nogut bilong yupela, na tanim bel, na bai God i rausim ol sin bilong yupela.

Sapos yupela i mekim olsem, orait Bikpela bai i givim nupela strong long yupela. Na em bai i salim dispela man em i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en, na em bai i kam long yupela. Dispela man God i makim bilong helpim yupela, em Jisas tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But for awhile, he must remain in heaven, until the times of restoration of all things, which God spoke long ago by the mouth of his holy prophets.

block.text: Nau em i mas i stap long heven na wetim dispela taim God i makim bilong mekim olgeta samting i kamap nupela gen, olsem bipo yet em i bin tok long maus bilong ol profet em i bin makim bilong mekim wok bilong em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For Moses indeed said to the fathers, ‘The Lord God will raise up a prophet for you from among your brothers, like me. You shall listen to him in all things whatever he says to you.

block.text: "Bipo Moses i bin tok olsem, 'God, Bikpela bilong yupela, em bai i makim wanpela brata bilong yupela, na mekim em i kamap profet olsem mi yet. Na yupela i mas bihainim olgeta tok em bai i mekim long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It will be, that every soul that will not listen to that prophet will be utterly destroyed from among the people.’

block.text: Na olgeta man i no laik harim tok bilong dispela profet, God bai i kilim ol i dai. Ol bai i no ken i stap moa insait long lain manmeri bilong Israel.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yes, and all the prophets from Samuel and those who followed after, as many as have spoken, they also told of these days.

block.text: Olgeta profet bipo i bin autim tok bilong God, stat long profet Samuel wantaim ol profet i kamap bihain long em, olgeta i bin tok long dispela taim nau i kamap pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You are the children of the prophets, and of the covenant which God made with our fathers, saying to Abraham, ‘In your seed will all the families of the earth be blessed.’

block.text: "Yupela i lain pikinini bilong ol profet, na yupela i man bilong kisim ol samting God i bin promis long givim taim em i mekim dispela kontrak wantaim ol tumbuna bilong yupela. Em i bin tokim Abraham olsem, 'Long tumbuna pikinini bilong yu mi bai mekim gut long olgeta lain manmeri bilong graun.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: God, having raised up his servant, Jesus, sent him to you first, to bless you, in turning away everyone of you from your wickedness.”

block.text: Orait God i kirapim dispela wokman bilong en, na i salim em i kam long yupela pastaim, bilong mekim gut long yupela na helpim yupela olgeta wan wan long lusim ol pasin nogut bilong yupela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: ACTS 4
As they spoke to the people, the priests and the captain of the temple and the Sadducees came to them.

block.text: Pita wantaim Jon i toktok yet long ol manmeri, na ol pris na ol Sadyusi wantaim kepten bilong ol man i save was long tempel, ol i kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were upset because they taught the people and proclaimed in Jesus the resurrection from the dead.

block.text: Ol i save, tupela i autim tok long ol manmeri olsem, Jisas i kirap pinis long matmat, na olgeta man i dai pinis, ol tu bai i kirap. Olsem na ol i gat bikpela kros long tupela

ReferenceBlocks.text: They laid hands on them, and put them in custody until the next day, for it was now evening.

block.text: na ol i holimpas tupela na ol i laik kotim tupela. Tasol klostu san i laik i go daun, olsem na ol i kalabusim tupela inap long tumora.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But many of those who heard the word believed, and the number of the men came to be about five thousand.

block.text: Tasol planti manmeri i harim tok pinis na ol i bilip long Jisas. Na namba bilong ol manmeri i bilip long en i go inap olsem 5,000.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened in the morning, that their rulers, elders, and scribes were gathered together in Jerusalem.

block.text: Long de bihain ol bikman bilong ol Juda, wantaim ol hetman na ol saveman bilong lo, ol i bung long Jerusalem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Annas the high priest was there, with Caiaphas, John, Alexander, and as many as were relatives of the high priest.

block.text: Hetpris Anas na Kaiafas na Jon na Aleksander na olgeta man bilong lain bilong hetpris ol i bung wantaim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had stood them in the middle of them, they inquired,

block.text: Ol i sanapim Pita na Jon long ai bilong ol, na ol i askim tupela olsem,

block.characterId: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)/Caiaphas, the high priest/John, Alexander, and other men of the high priest's family/elders/teachers of religious law/Sanhedrin

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)/Caiaphas, the high priest/John, Alexander, and other men of the high priest's family/elders/teachers of religious law/Sanhedrin
ReferenceBlocks.characterIdOverrideForScript: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)
ReferenceBlocks.text: “By what power, or in what name, have you done this?”

block.text: "Yupela i kisim wanem kain strong na yupela i mekim dispela samting? Yupela i mekim long nem bilong husat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then Peter, filled with the Holy Spirit, said to them,

block.text: Orait Holi Spirit i pulap long Pita, na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You rulers of the people, and elders of Israel,
are we being examined today concerning a good deed done to a crippled man? Are you asking by what means this man has been healed?

block.text: "Yupela bikman bilong Israel, na yupela hetman,
ating nau yupela i laik askim mitupela long mitupela i bin helpim wanpela man lek nogut. Na ating yupela i laik save, dispela man i kamap gutpela olsem wanem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Be it known to you all, and to all the people of Israel, that in the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth, whom you crucified, whom God raised from the dead, in him does this man stand here before you whole.

block.text: Sapos olsem, orait yupela olgeta i mas save, na olgeta lain Israel tu ol i mas save, long nem bilong Jisas Krais bilong Nasaret, dispela man lek nogut i bin kamap orait na nau em i sanap long ai bilong yupela. Yupela i bin nilim Jisas long diwai kros, tasol God i kirapim em bek long matmat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He is ‘the stone which was regarded as worthless by you, the builders, which has become the head of the corner.’

block.text: Jisas em i 'dispela ston yupela ol kamda i bin ting em i nogut na yupela i bin rausim. Tasol nau em i kamap nambawan ston bilong strongim banis bilong haus.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: There is salvation in none other, for neither is there any other name under heaven, that is given among men, by which we must be saved!”

block.text: I no gat narapela man i inap kisim bek yumi. Nogat. Long nem bilong Jisas wanpela tasol yumi olgeta manmeri bilong graun inap i stap gut. Em wanpela tasol God i bin makim bilong kisim bek yumi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John, and had perceived that they were unlearned and ignorant men, they marveled, saying:

block.text: Ol bikman i save, Pita wantaim Jon i no bin skul. Tupela i man nating tasol. Tasol ol i lukim tupela i tokaut strong na i no pret, olsem na ol i tingting planti. Na ol i save, bipo tupela i stap wantaim Jisas.

block.characterId: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)/Caiaphas, the high priest/John, Alexander, and other men of the high priest's family/elders/teachers of religious law/Sanhedrin

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)/Caiaphas, the high priest/John, Alexander, and other men of the high priest's family/elders/teachers of religious law/Sanhedrin
ReferenceBlocks.characterIdOverrideForScript: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)
ReferenceBlocks.text: “These men are disciples of Jesus!”
Seeing the man who was healed standing with them, they could say nothing against it.

block.text: Na ol i lukim dispela man, bodi bilong en i orait pinis, em i sanap wantaim tupela. Olsem na ol i no gat wanpela tok bilong bekim long tupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when they had commanded them to go aside out of the council, they conferred among themselves,
saying,

block.text: Orait ol bikman i tokim tupela long lusim haus kaunsil na i go ausait. Tupela i go pinis, na ol man i paitim toktok olsem,

block.characterId: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)/Caiaphas, the high priest/John, Alexander, and other men of the high priest's family/elders/teachers of religious law/Sanhedrin

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)/Caiaphas, the high priest/John, Alexander, and other men of the high priest's family/elders/teachers of religious law/Sanhedrin
ReferenceBlocks.characterIdOverrideForScript: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)
ReferenceBlocks.text: “What shall we do to these men? Because indeed a notable miracle has been done through them, as can be plainly seen by all who dwell in Jerusalem, and we can’t deny it.

block.text: "Bai yumi mekim wanem long dispela tupela man? Tupela i wokim wanpela mirakel, na olgeta manmeri long Jerusalem i save pinis long en. Yumi no inap haitim.

block.characterId: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)/Caiaphas, the high priest/John, Alexander, and other men of the high priest's family/elders/teachers of religious law/Sanhedrin

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)/Caiaphas, the high priest/John, Alexander, and other men of the high priest's family/elders/teachers of religious law/Sanhedrin
ReferenceBlocks.characterIdOverrideForScript: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)
ReferenceBlocks.text: But so that this spreads no further among the people, let’s threaten them, that from now on they don’t speak to anyone in this name.”

block.text: Tasol nogut dispela tok i go nabaut moa yet long ol manmeri. Olsem na yumi mas tok strong long tupela, na tupela i no ken autim tok moa long dispela nem long ol arapela man."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They called them and commanded them, saying:

block.text: Orait ol I singautim tupela na ol i tambuim tupela long tupela i

block.characterId: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)/Caiaphas, the high priest/John, Alexander, and other men of the high priest's family/elders/teachers of religious law/Sanhedrin

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)/Caiaphas, the high priest/John, Alexander, and other men of the high priest's family/elders/teachers of religious law/Sanhedrin
ReferenceBlocks.characterIdOverrideForScript: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do not preach in the name of Jesus any more!”

block.text: no ken mekim wanpela tok moa long nem bilong Jisas, na tupela i no ken skulim ol manmeri long dispela nem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Peter and John answered them,

block.text: Tasol Pita wantaim Jon i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Whether it is right in the sight of God to listen to you rather than to God, judge for yourselves.”

block.text: "Yupela i ting wanem pasin i stret long ai bilong God? Mitupela i mas bihainim tok bilong God o mitupela i mas bihainim tok bilong yupela? Yupela yet i ken skelim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We can’t help telling the things which we saw and heard.”

block.text: Tasol mitupela i no inap pasim maus. Mitupela i mas autim tok long olgeta samting mitupela i bin lukim na harim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had further threatened them, they let them go, finding no way to punish them, because of the people; for everyone glorified God for that which was done.

block.text: Orait ol kaunsil i givim sampela strongpela tok moa long tupela, na ol i lusim tupela i go, long wanem, ol i pret long ol manmeri. Olgeta manmeri i ting long dispela samting God i bin mekim na ol i wok long litimapim nem bilong en. Olsem na ol bikman i no gat rot bilong mekim save long tupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the man on whom this miracle of healing was performed was more than forty years old.

block.text: Dispela man, tupela i wokim mirakel na mekim em i kamap orait, em i winim 40 krismas pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Being let go, they came to their own company, and reported all that the chief priests and the elders had said to them.

block.text: Ol kaunsil i lusim Pita na Jon pinis, orait tupela i go bek long ol wanlain bilong tupela, na tupela i tokim ol long olgeta tok bilong ol bikpris wantaim ol hetman.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they heard it, they lifted up their voice to God with one accord, and said,

block.text: Ol i harim pinis, orait olgeta i wanbel na i beten wantaim long God olsem,

block.characterId: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem/Peter (Simon)/John

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem/Peter (Simon)/John
ReferenceBlocks.characterIdOverrideForScript: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem
ReferenceBlocks.text: “O Lord, you are God, who made the heaven, the earth, the sea, and all that is in them.

block.text: "Bikpela, yu bin wokim skai na graun na solwara na olgeta samting i stap long en.

block.characterId: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem/Peter (Simon)/John

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem/Peter (Simon)/John
ReferenceBlocks.characterIdOverrideForScript: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem
ReferenceBlocks.text: You said through the mouth of your servant, David, said, ‘Why do the nations rage, and the peoples plot a vain thing?

block.text: Bipo Holi Spirit bilong yu i bin givim wanpela tok long tumbuna bilong mipela, em wokman bilong yu, Devit. Na Devit i bin tok olsem, 'Bilong wanem olgeta lain manmeri ol i belhat tumas? Bilong wanem ol dispela manmeri i pasim tok nating bilong mekim ol pasin nogut?

block.characterId: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem/Peter (Simon)/John

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem/Peter (Simon)/John
ReferenceBlocks.characterIdOverrideForScript: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem
ReferenceBlocks.text: The kings of the earth take a stand, and the rulers take council together, against the Lord, and against his Christ.’”

block.text: Ol king bilong olgeta hap graun ol i redi long pait. Na ol hetman i bung wantaim bilong daunim Bikpela, na bilong daunim dispela man em i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en.'

block.characterId: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem/Peter (Simon)/John

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem/Peter (Simon)/John
ReferenceBlocks.characterIdOverrideForScript: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem
ReferenceBlocks.text: “For truly, in this city against your holy child, Jesus, whom you anointed, both Herod and Pontius Pilate, with the Gentiles and the people of Israel, were gathered together.

block.text: "Tru tumas, Herot na Pontius Pailat wantaim ol man bilong ol arapela lain na ol Israel, ol i bin bung wantaim long dispela taun bilong daunim Jisas, dispela wokman bilong yu yet, bipo yu makim em long mekim wok bilong yu.

block.characterId: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem/Peter (Simon)/John

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem/Peter (Simon)/John
ReferenceBlocks.characterIdOverrideForScript: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem
ReferenceBlocks.text: They were to do whatever your hand and your council foreordained to happen.

block.text: Taim ol i mekim dispela samting, ol i bin bihainim tingting na laik bilong yu tasol. Long strong bilong yu, bipo yet yu bin pasim tok long ol dispela samting i mas kamap.

block.characterId: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem/Peter (Simon)/John

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem/Peter (Simon)/John
ReferenceBlocks.characterIdOverrideForScript: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem
ReferenceBlocks.text: Now, Lord, look at their threats, and grant to your servants to speak your word with all boldness.

block.text: Orait Bikpela, yu mas tingting nau long olgeta tok ol i mekim bilong pretim mipela, na yu mas helpim mipela ol wokboi bilong yu. Olsem na bai mipela i ken strong tru long autim tok bilong yu, na mipela i no ken pret.

block.characterId: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem/Peter (Simon)/John

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem/Peter (Simon)/John
ReferenceBlocks.characterIdOverrideForScript: apostles, elders, and whole church at Jerusalem
ReferenceBlocks.text: May you stretch out your hand to heal and show signs and wonders through the name of your holy child Jesus.”

block.text: Na yu ken putim han bilong yu long ol sikman na mekim ol i orait gen, na yu ken wokim ol kain kain mirakel long nem bilong Jisas, em wokman bilong yu yet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had prayed, the place was shaken where they were gathered together. They were all filled with the Holy Spirit, and they spoke the word of God with boldness.

block.text: Ol i beten pinis, na dispela haus ol i bung long en em i guria. Na Holi Spirit i pulap long ol, na ol i autim tok bilong God. Ol i tokaut strong na ol i no pret.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The multitude of those who believed were of one heart and soul. Not one of them claimed that anything of the things which he possessed was his own, but they had all things in common.

block.text: Olgeta manmeri i bilip long Jisas, ol i wanbel na ol i gat wanpela tingting tasol. I no gat wanpela man i lukim wanpela samting bilong en na i tok olsem, "Dispela samting em i bilong mi stret." Nogat. Olgeta samting bilong ol i bilong olgeta wantaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: With great power, the apostles gave their testimony of the resurrection of the Lord Jesus. Great grace was on them all.

block.text: Ol aposel ol i wok long autim tok long Bikpela Jisas i kirap bek, na tok bilong ol i gat bikpela strong. Na God i gat bikpela laik long helpim ol dispela manmeri, na em i mekim gut tru long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For neither was there among them any who lacked, for as many as were owners of lands or houses sold them, and brought the proceeds of the things that were sold,
and laid them at the apostles’ feet, and distribution was made to each, according as anyone had need.

block.text: I no gat wanpela man namel long ol em i sot long kaikai samting. Olgeta man i gat graun o haus, ol i save salim long ol arapela man na ol i kisim mani long dispela. Na ol i save bringim dispela mani i kam,
na givim long ol aposel. Na ol aposel i save tilim long ol manmeri i sot long ol samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Joses, who by the apostles was surnamed Barnabas (which is, being interpreted, Son of Encouragement), a Levite, a man of Cyprus by race,
having a field, sold it, and brought the money and laid it at the apostles’ feet.

block.text: Na i gat wanpela man i stap, nem bilong en Josep. Na ol aposel i givim narapela nem Barnabas long em. Nem Barnabas em i wankain olsem dispela tok, "Man bilong strongim bel." Barnabas em i wanpela Livai, na em i man bilong ailan Saiprus.
Em i salim wanpela hap graun bilong en long narapela man. Na mani em i kisim, em i bringim i kam na givim long ol aposel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: ACTS 5
But a certain man named Ananias, with Sapphira, his wife, sold a possession.

block.text: Wanpela man i stap, nem bilong en Ananaias, na meri bilong em, nem bilong en Safaira. Ananaias i salim wanpela hap graun bilong en long wanpela man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He kept back part of the price, his wife also being aware of it, and brought a certain part, and laid it at the apostles’ feet.
But Peter said,

block.text: Na hap bilong mani em i kisim, Ananaias i putim i stap bilong em yet. Meri bilong en tu i save long dispela. Na Ananaias i giaman olsem em i kisim olgeta mani i kam na i givim long ol aposel.
Na Pita i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Ananias, why has Satan filled your heart to lie to the Holy Spirit, and to keep back part of the price of the land?

block.text: "Ananaias, olsem wanem na yu larim Satan i pulap long bel bilong yu, na yu laik giamanim Holi Spirit, na yu haitim hap mani yu bin kisim long dispela hap graun bilong yu?

ReferenceBlocks.text: While you kept it, didn’t it remain your own? After it was sold, wasn’t it in your power? How is it that you have conceived this thing in your heart? You haven’t lied to men, but to God.”

block.text: Yu bin salim dispela graun long laik bilong yu tasol. Na mani yu kisim long en, em samting bilong yu tu, na yu ken mekim wanem samting yu laik mekim long en. Olsem wanem na yu kisim dispela tingting nogut? Yu no ken ting yu laik giamanim ol man tasol. Nogat. Yu laik giamanim God yet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Ananias, hearing these words, fell down and died. Great fear came on all who heard these things.

block.text: Ananaias i harim dispela tok na em i pundaun na wantu em i dai. Na ol man i harim tok long samting i bin kamap long Ananaias, ol i pret nogut tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The young men arose and wrapped him up, and they carried him out and buried him.

block.text: Na ol yangpela man i kam na ol i pasim bodi bilong en long laplap, na ol i karim i go na planim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: About three hours later, his wife, not knowing what had happened, came in.
Peter answered her,

block.text: Tripela aua i go pinis, na meri bilong Ananaias i kam insait. Em i no save long dispela samting i bin kamap long man bilong en.
Na Pita i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Tell me whether you sold the land for so much.”

block.text: "Yu tokim mi, ating em tasol mani yutupela i bin kisim long graun bilong yutupela, a?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: She said,

block.text: Na meri i tok,

block.characterId: Sapphira, wife of Ananias of Jerusalem

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: Sapphira, wife of Ananias of Jerusalem
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Yes, for so much.”

block.text: "Em i stret. Em tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Peter asked her,

block.text: Na Pita i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “How is it that you have agreed together to tempt the Spirit of the Lord?

block.text: "Watpo yutupela i pasim tok long traim Spirit bilong Bikpela?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, the feet of those who have buried your husband are at the door, and they will carry you out.”

block.text: Harim. Ol man i planim man bilong yu, ol i wokabaut i kam insait long dua. Na ol bai i karim yu tu i go."

ReferenceBlocks.text: She fell down immediately at his feet, and died.

block.text: Orait wantu dispela meri i pundaun klostu long lek bilong Pita na em i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The young men came in and found her dead, and they carried her out and buried her by her husband.

block.text: Na ol yangpela man i kam insait, na ol i lukim dispela meri i dai pinis. Na ol i karim em i go, na ol i planim em klostu long man bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Great fear came on the whole assembly, and on all who heard these things.

block.text: Na olgeta manmeri bilong sios na ol arapela manmeri i harim tok long dispela samting i bin kamap, ol i pret moa yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By the hands of the apostles many signs and wonders were done among the people. They were all with one accord in Solomon’s porch.

block.text: Ol aposel i wokim ol kain kain mirakel namel long ol manmeri. Na olgeta manmeri i bilip long Bikpela, ol i wanbel na ol i save go insait long banis bilong tempel, na bung long veranda bilong Solomon.

ReferenceBlocks.text: None of the rest dared to join them, however the people honored them.

block.text: Ol manmeri i no i stap insait long lain bilong ol, ol i save litimapim nem bilong ol. Tasol ol dispela manmeri i pret, olsem na ol i no save kam bung wantaim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: More believers were added to the Lord, multitudes of both men and women.

block.text: Na planti manmeri moa yet i bilip long Bikpela, na ol i kam insait long lain bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They even carried out the sick into the streets, and laid them on cots and mattresses, so that as Peter came by, at the least his shadow might overshadow some of them.

block.text: Ol manmeri i save long ol mirakel ol aposel i wokim. Olsem na ol i save karim ol sikman i kam ausait na slipim ol long ol mat na long ol bet arere long ol rot Pita i save wokabaut i kam long en, long wanem, ol i laik bai san i ken sutim tewel bilong Pita i go long ol dispela sikman.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Multitudes also came together from the cities around Jerusalem, bringing sick people, and those who were tormented by unclean spirits: and they were all healed.

block.text: Ol manmeri bilong ol taun klostu long Jerusalem, ol tu i kam lukim ol aposel. Ol i bringim ol sikman i kam, wantaim ol man i gat ol spirit nogut i bagarapim ol. Na dispela olgeta manmeri ol i kamap orait gen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the high priest rose up, and all those who were with him (which is the sect of the Sadducees), and they were filled with jealousy.

block.text: Hetpris wantaim ol poroman bilong en, em ol man bilong lain Sadyusi, ol i lukim ol dispela samting ol aposel i mekim na ol i bel nogut tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They laid hands on the apostles and put them in public custody.

block.text: Ol i kirap na holimpas ol aposel na putim ol long kalabus wantaim ol man nogut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But an angel of the Lord opened the prison doors by night, and brought them out, and said,

block.text: Tasol long nait wanpela ensel bilong Bikpela i opim dua bilong haus kalabus na i bringim ol i kam ausait, na i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Go stand and speak in the temple to the people all the words of this life.”

block.text: "Yupela go sanap insait long banis bilong tempel na autim tok long ol manmeri long olgeta pasin bilong dispela nupela laip."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they heard this, they entered into the temple about daybreak, and taught. But the high priest came, and those who were with him, and called the council together, and all the senate of the children of Israel, and sent to the prison to have them brought.

block.text: Ol aposel i harim dispela tok, orait ol i go long tempel long moningtaim tru, na ol i wok long autim tok long ol manmeri. Na hetpris wantaim ol poroman bilong en i singautim ol kaunsil na olgeta hetman bilong Israel, na ol i kam bung . Na ol i salim tok i go long haus kalabus, long ol i mas bringim ol aposel i kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the officers who came didn’t find them in the prison. They returned and reported,

block.text: Orait ol plisman i go long haus kalabus, tasol ol i no lukim ol aposel i stap. Na ol i go bek na ol i tokim ol bikman olsem, l

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We found the prison shut and locked, and the guards standing before the doors, but when we opened them, we found no one inside!”

block.text: "Mipela i lukim ol dua bilong haus kalabus, ol i lokim strong na ol gat i sanap was i stap long olgeta dua. Tasol taim mipela i opim dua, mipela i no lukim wanpela man i stap insait."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now when the high priest, the captain of the temple, and the chief priests heard these words, they were very perplexed about them and wondered:

block.text: Kepten bilong ol man i save was long tempel wantaim ol bikpris i harim dispela tok, na ol i tingting planti, na ol i tok,

block.characterId: captain of the temple guard/chief priests

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: captain of the temple guard/chief priests
ReferenceBlocks.text: “What will happen now?”

block.text: "Ol dispela man i lus olsem wanem?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: One came and told them,

block.text: Na wanpela man i kamap na i tokim ol olsem,

block.characterId: person who told the guards and priests where the apostles were

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: person who told the guards and priests where the apostles were
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, the men whom you put in prison are in the temple, standing and teaching the people.”

block.text: "Harim. Ol dispela man yupela i putim long haus kalabus, nau ol i sanap insait long banis bilong tempel na ol i autim tok long ol manmeri i stap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the captain went with the officers, and brought them without violence, for they were afraid that the people might stone them.

block.text: Olsem na kepten wantaim ol plisman i go bringim ol aposel i kam. Tasol ol i no mekim wanpela samting long ol. Nogat. Ol i pret, nogut ol manmeri i tromoi ston long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had brought them, they set them before the council. The high priest questioned them,
saying,

block.text: Ol plisman i bringim ol aposel i kam na sanapim ol long ai bilong ol kaunsil. Na hetpris i tokim ol olsem,

block.characterId: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Didn’t we strictly command you not to teach in this name?

block.text: "Mipela i bin tambuim yupela tru long yupela i no ken autim tok long ol manmeri long nem bilong dispela man.

block.characterId: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)
ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, you have filled Jerusalem with your teaching, and intend to bring this man’s blood on us.”

block.text: Tasol yupela i wok yet long autim tok, na ol manmeri long olgeta hap bilong Jerusalem i harim pinis tok bilong yupela. Na yupela i laik sutim tok long mipela i bin kilim dispela man i dai."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Peter and the apostles answered,

block.text: Tasol Pita wantaim ol arapela aposel i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We must obey God rather than men.

block.text: "Mipela i mas bihainim tok bilong God tasol. Mipela i no ken bihainim tok bilong ol man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The God of our fathers raised up Jesus, whom you killed, hanging him on a tree.

block.text: Yupela i bin nilim Jisas long wanpela diwai na kilim em i dai, tasol God bilong ol tumbuna bilong yumi em i kirapim em bek.

ReferenceBlocks.text: God exalted him with his right hand to be a Prince and a Savior, to give repentance to Israel, and remission of sins.

block.text: God i kisim em i go antap na i putim em i stap long han sut bilong em. Na em i stap man bilong soim rot long yumi na kisim bek yumi, na em bai i helpim yumi Israel long tanim bel, na em bai i lusim sin bilong yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We are His witnesses of these things; and so also is the Holy Spirit, whom God has given to those who obey him.”

block.text: Mipela i lukim dispela ol samting God i bin mekim, na mipela i save autim tok long en. Na Holi Spirit tu i autim tok long ol dispela samting. God i bin givim Holi Spirit long ol manmeri i bihainim tok bilong em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But they, when they heard this, were cut to the heart, and determined to kill them.

block.text: Ol kaunsil i harim dispela tok bilong Pita, na ol i belhat nogut tru, na ol i laik kilim ol aposel i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But one stood up in the council, a Pharisee named Gamaliel, a teacher of the law, honored by all the people, and commanded to put the apostles out for a little while.
He said to them,

block.text: Tasol wanpela kaunsil em i sanap. Em i wanpela Farisi, na nem bilong en Gamaliel. Em i tisa bilong lo, na olgeta manmeri i save litimapim nem bilong em. Em i tokim ol man long kisim ol aposel i go i stap ausait long sotpela taim liklik.
Ol i go ausait pinis, orait Gamaliel i tokim ol arapela kaunsil olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You men of Israel, be careful concerning these men, what you are about to do.

block.text: "Yupela man bilong Israel, sapos yupela i laik mekim wanpela samting long ol dispela man, mobeta yupela i tingting gut pastaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For before these days Theudas rose up, making himself out to be somebody; to whom a number of men, about four hundred, joined themselves: He was slain; and all, as many as obeyed him, were dispersed, and came to nothing.

block.text: Yupela i save, i no longtaim i go pinis na Teudas i bin kirap na i tok, 'Mi bikman, mi gat namba.' Na klostu inap 400 man i bin bihainim em. Tasol gavman i kilim em i dai, na ol man i bilip long em ol i ranawe nabaut, na wok bilong ol i lus nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: After this man, Judas of Galilee rose up in the days of the enrollment, and drew away some people after him. He also perished, and all, as many as obeyed him, were scattered abroad.

block.text: Na bihain, long taim gavman i kisim nem bilong ol manmeri, Judas bilong Galili em i kirap na i pulim tingting bilong sampela manmeri. Na ol i bihainim em na kirapim pait bilong rausim gavman. Tasol ol i kilim em i dai, na olgeta man i bilip long em ol i ranawe na ol i go nabaut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now I tell you, withdraw from these men, and leave them alone. For if this counsel or this work is of men, it will be overthrown.

block.text: Olsem na nau mi tokim yupela, yupela i no ken mekim wanpela samting long ol dispela man. Nogat. Yupela i mas larim ol i stap. Sapos dispela wok ol i mekim em i kirap long tingting bilong ol man tasol, orait em bai i bagarap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if it is of God, you will not be able to overthrow it, and you would be found even to be fighting against God!”

block.text: Tasol sapos God yet i kirapim dispela wok, orait yupela bai i no inap pasim ol. Nogut yupela i pait long God!"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They agreed with him. Summoning the apostles, they beat them and commanded them not to speak in the name of Jesus, and let them go.

block.text: Orait ol kaunsil i bihainim tok bilong Gamaliel.Ol i singautim ol aposel i kam, na ol i tokim ol man long wipim ol. Na ol i tambuim ol long ol i no ken autim tok moa long nem bilong Jisas. Na ol i lusim ol i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They therefore departed from the presence of the council, rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer dishonor for Jesus’ name.

block.text: Olsem na ol aposel i lusim kaunsil na i go ausait. Na ol i amamas long God i ting ol inap long kisim sem long nem bilong Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Every day, in the temple and at home, they never stopped teaching and preaching Jesus, the Christ.

block.text: Na long olgeta de, ol i save go long tempel na long ol haus bilong ol manmeri, na ol i wok long skulim ol manmeri. Ol i no lusim wok bilong autim gutnius. Nogat. Ol i tokaut klia olsem, Jisas em i dispela man God i bin promis long salim i kam bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: ACTS 6
Now in those days, when the number of the disciples was multiplying, a complaint arose from the Hellenists against the Hebrews, because their widows were neglected in the daily service.

block.text: Long dispela taim namba bilong ol disaipel i kamap planti moa. Na ol disaipel i save tok Grik, ol i gat kros long ol disaipel i save tok Aram. Ol i tok olsem, "Long olgeta de yupela i save helpim ol manmeri i sot long kaikai samting, tasol yupela i no save helpim ol meri bilong mipela, man bilong ol i dai pinis."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The twelve summoned the multitude of the disciples and said,

block.text: Olsem na ol 12 -pela aposel i singautim olgeta disaipel i kam, na ol i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It is not appropriate for us to forsake the word of God and serve tables.

block.text: "Sapos mipela i lusim wok bilong autim tok bilong God na mipela i wok long tilim kaikai, em i no stret.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore select from among you, brothers, seven men of good report, full of the Holy Spirit and of wisdom, whom we may appoint over this business.

block.text: Olsem na ol brata, yupela i mas painim 7 -pela man namel long yupela, ol i gat gutpela nem namel long ol manmeri, na Holi Spirit i pulap long ol, na ol i gat gutpela save. Na yumi ken putim ol dispela man bilong lukautim dispela wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But we will continue steadfastly in prayer and in the ministry of the word.”

block.text: Tasol mipela yet i ken wok oltaim long beten na long helpim ol manmeri long tok bilong God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: These words pleased the whole multitude. They chose Stephen, a man full of faith and of the Holy Spirit, Philip, Prochorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas, and Nicolaus, a proselyte of Antioch.

block.text: Olgeta manmeri ol i laikim dispela tok bilong ol aposel. Na ol i makim Stiven, em man i gat strongpela bilip, na Holi Spirit i pulap long em. Na ol i makim Filip na Prokorus na Nikanor na Timon na Parmenas na Nikolas. Nikolas em i man bilong Antiok, na em i no wanpela Juda, tasol em i bihainim lotu bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They set them before the apostles. When they had prayed, they laid their hands on them.

block.text: Ol i sanapim ol dispela man long ai bilong ol aposel, na ol aposel i beten na i putim han antap long ol bilong makim ol bilong mekim dispela wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The word of God increased and the number of the disciples multiplied in Jerusalem exceedingly. A great company of the priests were obedient to the faith.

block.text: Na tok bilong God i go nabaut long olgeta hap. Na planti manmeri moa i kamap disaipel long Jerusalem. Na planti pris tu ol i bihainim tok bilong God na ol i bilip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Stephen, full of faith and power, performed great wonders and signs among the people.

block.text: God i helpim tru Stiven na i givim strong long em, olsem na Stiven i save wokim ol kain kain bikpela mirakel namel long ol manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But some of those who were of the synagogue called “The Libertines,” and of the Cyrenians, of the Alexandrians, and of those of Cilicia and Asia arose, disputing with Stephen.

block.text: Tasol sampela man i kirap na ol i pait long toktok wantaim Stiven. Ol i man bilong wanpela haus lotu bilong ol Juda, ol i kolim haus lotu bilong ol friman. Ol i man bilong taun Sairini na taun Aleksandria na bilong tupela provins Silisia na Esia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They weren’t able to withstand the wisdom and the Spirit by which he spoke.

block.text: Na Holi Spirit i givim gutpela save tru long Stiven, olsem na ol dispela man i no inap winim tok bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then they secretly induced men to say,

block.text: Olsem na ol i hait na grisim sampela man long tok giaman olsem,

block.characterId: Jews of Cyrene, Alexandria, Cilicia & Asia

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: Jews of Cyrene, Alexandria, Cilicia & Asia
ReferenceBlocks.text: “We have heard him speak blasphemous words against Moses and God.”

block.text: "Mipela i bin harim Stiven i mekim tok nogut long Moses na long God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They stirred up the people, the elders, and the scribes. Then they came against Stephen and seized him, and brought him in to the council.

block.text: Na long dispela pasin ol i kirapim bel bilong ol manmeri na bilong ol hetman na ol saveman bilong lo. Na ol i go long Stiven na holimpas em, na ol i bringim em i go long kaunsil.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They set up false witnesses who said,

block.text: Na ol i sanapim sampela man bilong sutim tok giaman long em. Ol dispela man i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “This man never stops speaking blasphemous words against this holy place and the law.

block.text: "Oltaim oltaim dispela man i save mekim tok nogut long haus bilong God na long lo bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For we have heard him say that this Jesus of Nazareth will destroy this place, and will change the customs which Moses delivered to us.”

block.text: Mipela i bin harim em i tok olsem, 'Dispela man Jisas bilong Nasaret bai i bagarapim dispela haus na senisim ol pasin bipo Moses i bin givim yumi.' "

ReferenceBlocks.text: All who sat in the council, fastening their eyes on him, saw his face like it was the face of an angel.

block.text: Na olgeta man i sindaun long kaunsil, ol i lukluk strong long Stiven, na ol i lukim pes bilong en i lait olsem pes bilong wanpela ensel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: ACTS 7
The high priest said,

block.text: Orait hetpris i askim Stiven olsem,

block.characterId: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: Ananias (Annas), the high priest (father-in-law of Caiaphas)
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Are these things so?”

block.text: "Dispela tok ol man I sutim long yu, em i tru, o nogat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said,

block.text: Na Stiven i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Brothers and fathers, listen. The God of glory appeared to our father Abraham, when he was in Mesopotamia, before he lived in Haran.

block.text: "Ol brata na ol papa, yupela harim. Taim tumbuna bilong yumi Abraham i stap long graun bilong Mesopotemia na i no i go yet long taun Haran, God bilong heven, em God i gat bikpela strong, em i kamap long Abraham.

ReferenceBlocks.text: God said to him, ‘Get out of your land, and from your relatives, and come into a land which I will show you.’

block.text: Na God i tokim em olsem, 'Yu lusim graun bilong yu na ol brata bilong yu, na yu go long wanpela graun bai mi soim yu long en.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he came out of the land of the Chaldaeans, and lived in Haran. From there, when his father was dead, God moved him into this land, where you are now living.

block.text: Olsem na Abraham i lusim graun bilong ol Kaldia na em i go i stap long Haran. Na taim papa bilong en i dai pinis, God i salim em i kam i stap long dispela graun, nau yupela i stap long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He gave him no inheritance in it, no, not so much as to set his foot on. God promised that he would give it to him for a possession, and to his seed after him, when he still had no child.

block.text: God i no givim wanpela liklik hap bilong dispela graun, inap olsem wan mita, long Abraham, bai em i ken i stap graun bilong ol lain bilong em stret. Tasol God i tok, bihain bai em i givim dispela graun long em, na em bai i stap graun bilong en na bilong ol lain pikinini bilong en. Long taim God i mekim dispela tok, Abraham i no gat pikinini yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: God spoke in this way: that his seed would live as aliens in a strange land, and that they would be enslaved and mistreated for four hundred years.

block.text: God i tokim Abraham olsem, 'Bai ol lain tumbuna pikinini bilong yu i go i stap long kantri bilong ol arapela lain. Na bai ol i kamap wokboi nating, na ol arapela lain bai i mekim nogut long ol inap 400 yia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: ‘I will judge the nation to which they will be in bondage,’ said God, ‘and after that will they come out, and serve me in this place.’

block.text: Tasol bihain bai mi kotim ol dispela man i mekim dispela pasin long ol. Na bihain ol lain pikinini bilong ol bai i lusim dispela kantri na bai ol i kam lotu long mi long dispela ples.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: He gave him the covenant of circumcision. So Abraham became the father of Isaac, and circumcised him the eighth day. Isaac became the father of Jacob, and Jacob became the father of the twelve patriarchs.”

block.text: Na God i tok bai Abraham i mas katim skin olsem mak bilong kontrak God i givim long em. Na bihain Abraham i kamap papa bilong Aisak, na em i wet wanpela wik na em i katim skin bilongAisak. Na Aisak i kamap papa bilong Jekop, na Jekop i kamap papa bilong ol 12 -pela tumbuna bilong yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The patriarchs, moved with jealousy against Joseph, sold him into Egypt. God was with him

block.text: "Ol dispela tumbuna ol i bel nogut long Josep, brata bilong ol, na ol i salim em olsem wokboi nating long ol arapela lain man. Na ol dispela man i bringim em i go long Isip. Tasol God i stap wantaim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He delivered him out of all his afflictions and gave him favor and wisdom before Pharaoh, king of Egypt. He made him governor over Egypt and all his house.

block.text: God i helpim em na i pinisim olgeta hevi bilong en. Na taim Josep i toktok wantaim king bilong Isip, God i givim gutpela save long em na i mekim king i laikim em. Olsem na king i makim em i stap namba wan gavman bilong Isip, na em i bosim olgeta samting long haus bilong king.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now a famine came over all the land of Egypt and Canaan, and great affliction. Our fathers found no food.

block.text: "Bihain taim bilong bikpela hangre i kamap long olgeta hap bilong Isip na long olgeta hap bilong graun Kenan, na ol manmeri i gat bikpela hevi. Na ol tumbuna bilong yumi i no gat kaikai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when Jacob heard that there was grain in Egypt, he sent out our fathers the first time.

block.text: Tasol Jekop i harim tok olsem i gat wit i stap long Isip, na em i salim ol tumbuna bilong yumi i go long Isip namba wan taim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: On the second time Joseph was made known to his brothers, and Joseph’s race was revealed to Pharaoh.

block.text: Orait taim ol i go long namba 2 taim gen, Josep i tokim ol brata olsem, 'Mi Josep.' Na bihain king tu i save long ol lain bilong Josep.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Joseph sent, and summoned Jacob, his father, and all his relatives, seventy-five souls.

block.text: Na Josep i salim tok na i singautim papa bilong en Jekop i kam long em, wantaim olgeta lain bilong en, inap olsem 75 manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jacob went down into Egypt, and he died. Our forefathers died there also.

block.text: Orait Jekop i go daun long Isip. Na bihain em i dai, na ol tumbuna bilong yumi ol tu i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were all brought back to Shechem and laid in the tomb that Abraham bought for a price in silver from the children of Hamor of Shechem.”

block.text: Na ol i karim bodi bilong ol i go bek long taun Sekem na planim ol long dispela matmat, bipo Abraham i bin givim mani silva bilong baim long ol pikinini bilong Hamor long Sekem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “But as the time of the promise came close which God had sworn to Abraham, the people grew and multiplied in Egypt.

block.text: "Orait taim God i makim bilong inapim dispela promis bipo em i bin mekim long Abraham, dispela taim klostu i laik kamap. Na ol lain Israel i stap long Isip, na ol i kamap bikpela lain tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then there arose a different king, who didn’t know Joseph.

block.text: Na bihain wanpela man i kamap king bilong Isip, na em i no save long Josep.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The same took advantage of our race, and mistreated our fathers, and forced them to throw out their babies, so that they wouldn’t stay alive.

block.text: Dispela king i bin trikim ol lain bilong yumi na mekim pasin nogut long ol. Na em i mekim ol i tromoi ol liklik pikinini bilong ol, bai ol i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: At that time Moses was born, and was exceedingly handsome. He was nourished three months in his father’s house.

block.text: Long dispela taim mama bilong Moses i karim em. Em i gutpela pikinini, na God i laikim em. Na ol i bin lukautim em long haus bilong papa bilong en inap long tripela mun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he was thrown out, Pharaoh’s daughter took him up, and reared him as her own son.

block.text: Bihain ol i putim em i stap ausait, na pikinini meri bilong king i kisim em na i lukautim em olsem pikinini bilong em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Moses was instructed in all the wisdom of the Egyptians. He was mighty in his words and works.

block.text: Na Moses i skul long olgeta gutpela save bilong ol Isip, na em i kamap man bilong mekim ol strongpela toktok na ol kain kain strongpela wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when he was forty years old, it came into his heart to visit his brothers, the children of Israel.

block.text: "Taim Moses i gat 40 krismas pinis, na em i tingting long i go lukim ol brata bilong em, ol Israel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Seeing one of them suffer wrong, he defended him, and avenged him who was oppressed, striking the Egyptian.
